description:
Gisela is a witch who battles Kyouko within the flashback scene in Episode 7.
The silver witch, with a liberal nature. She dwells in a barrier where everything moves at high speed, but the witch herself is dull. She unfortunately can not use any sort of scientific power. Her body was once dazzling with silver, but her body has rusted as she gazes upon the coastal sunset.
name: Gisela
